locutie.beschrijving: A dialogue-sermon between Luise Schottroff (exegete) and Dorothee Sölle (poet/theologian). Content focuses on Mary Magdalene's grief, the political context of Roman occupation, modern ecological/political despair (Chernobyl, Apartheid), and the vision of a 'Women's Church' (Frauenkirche).
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Strong socio-historical context regarding Roman crucifixion practices and the Johannine community's trauma.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily Assertive (describing the world's pain) and Expressive (lamenting). The illocutionary force shifts toward the end into Commissive (promises of the Spirit) and Directive (sending out).
voorbeelden: Ich will mit Maria Magdalena weinen (Expressive)
Gehe zu meinen Brüdern und sage ihnen (Directive/Scripture Quote)

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To move the hearer from resignation/cynicism to political and spiritual agency (Auferstehungsprozesse).
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Yes, explicitly mentioned as the 'breath' of Jesus and the 'Spirit of courage'.

voorbeelden: Gott verspricht sie nicht einem nuklearen Winter auszuliefern.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong but late. The promises are concentrated in the final 'Frauenaussendung'.

declaratieven.autoriteit: The authority is derived from the 'X-factor' (God) and the shared experience of the 'Women's Church'.

indicatoren: Long historical explanations of Roman law
Extensive descriptions of the 1983 church congress
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed and politically sharpened, but might feel like a spectator of a lecture for the first two-thirds.

missende_elementen: Immediate sacramental address ('I say to you today')
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Delayed encounter with the living Christ until the final section.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High theological quality, addressing the hearer as 'Sisters'.
voorbeelden: Liebe Schwestern, ihr werdet neue Kraft empfangen.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Subjective identification (I want to weep, I am tired).

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the 'Sisters' and 'Brothers' in the final sending.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Mary, the Romans, the ANC, the government.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a historical/political distance that requires bridging.

voorbeelden: Ich will weinen... Gott verspricht... Geht hin!
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The pattern is sound but the 'Assertive' phase is very long, delaying the sacramental event.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Er ist bei euch (Indicative) ... Geht zu meinen Brüdern (Imperative).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: Despite the constative surplus, the sermon functions as a 'speech act' because it moves from description to the actual 'Aussendung' (sending) which constitutes the church as a 'Frauenkirche'.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Ich will mit Maria Magdalena weinen.
sterke_punten.effect: Hearer feels seen in their despair.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Tacitus berichtet über die römische Praxis...
zwakke_punten.probleem: Interrupts the flow of the 'event' with academic data.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The transition from 'weeping' to 'walking' is a tangible event in the text.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The 'Toezegging' (Promise) at the end is powerful but could have been woven throughout.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Yes, through the 'X-factor' and the words of the Risen Christ.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Yes, the Spirit is the 'breath' and 'courage'.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicitly left to the Spirit to 'make us visible'.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, the sermon is seen as an 'Auferstehungsprozess'.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 'is' and 'was' verbs; needs more 'I promise you' and 'You are'.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Das Johannesevangelium erzählt, Maria Magdalena sei...
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Maria Magdalena steht heute hier unter uns am Grab.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from historical report to present encounter.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried at the very end.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interject the 'Doch' of God earlier into the lament sections.
voorbeeldzinnen: Mitten in deinem Weinen sagt er deinen Namen.
Ihr seid diese Frauen am Grab.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful example of political-sacramental preaching that successfully bridges the gap between ancient text and modern trauma through performative lament and sending.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the 'Self-disclosure' of Schottroff/Sölle; SAT focuses on the 'Declaration' of Resurrection as a new reality.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: It is not just persuading people to be political; it is 'breathing' the Spirit into them (Illocution).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the 'Women's Church' is not just an idea, but is 'called into being' by the final Commissive acts.

kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Creates a new reality for the speaker and hearer.

appendices.notities: The dialogue format naturally increases the 'Expressive' count but can also lead to 'talking about' the dialogue itself.
